name: big-nugget
short_effect: Sell to Ore Collector for 30000 Pokédollars.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
A big nugget of pure gold that gives off
a lustrous gleam.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
A big nugget of pure gold that gives off
a lustrous gleam.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A big nugget of pure gold that gives
off a lustrous gleam. It can be sold
at a high price to shops.
